title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
**12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner - 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth (Terracotta)**

Add a touch of elegance and rustic charm to your special occasion with our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner. Made from high-quality polyester, this set of 12 table runners is perfect for weddings, bridal showers, birthday parties, and other celebrations.

**Product Features:**

- Soft, comfortable, and durable material for a premium look and feel
- One size fits most tables: 35 inches wide and 118 inches long
- Perfect for various occasions: wedding parties, holiday parties, birthday parties, restaurants, hotels, chair cover sashes, decorative napkins, and gift wrapping
- Reusable and easy to care for: hand or machine wash in cold water with mild detergent on a gentle cycle
- Do not iron: to maintain the soft texture and prevent damage

**Product Details:**

- Material: High-quality polyester
- Package Contents: 12 pieces of cheesecloth table runners
- Dimensions: 35 inches wide and 118 inches long
- Color: Terracotta

**Care Instructions:**

- Washing: Hand wash or machine wash in cold water with mild detergent on a gentle cycle
- Water Temperature: Cold
- Detergent: Mild
- Machine Cycle: Gentle
- Ironing: Do not iron
- Hot Water Use: Avoid using hot water

**Why Choose Our Cheesecloth Table Runner?**

- Soft and comfortable texture for a premium look and feel
- Durable and long-lasting for multiple uses
- Easy to care for and maintain
- Perfect for various occasions and celebrations
- High-quality polyester material for a luxurious feel

**Order Now and Add a Touch of Elegance to Your Special Occasion!**

Please note that the product is available for free contact for any questions or concerns.
